name: non-zone
description: Non-Zone is the global map for experiential and solo-travelers

scripts.deploy:dev: REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='development' && yarn build-for-web && firebase deploy -P default
scripts.deploy:prod: REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='production' && yarn build-for-web && firebase deploy -P production
scripts.aw:build:dev: yarn set-io-arweave && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='development' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false yarn build-for-web && yarn reset-io
scripts.aw:build:prod: yarn set-io-arweave && REACT_APP_NONZONE_ENV='production' GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false yarn build-for-web && yarn reset-io
scripts.build-for-web: yarn --cwd nonzone-lib build && yarn --cwd webapp build

author: Non-Zone team
